parts: You can choose a file to upload here. The INDI specification requires the file size before compression to be sent with the data.  Therefore upload an uncompressed file here, to allow the web server to measure the size. You can also instruct the web server to then compress the file if required.
Check here if you want the web server to compress your file (using gzip) before sending it on to indiserver. This will also add the extension '.gz' to the file.
